headline: Burt's Bees™ and Mike's Hot Honey® Turn Up the Heat with Limited-Edition Lip Balm Collab
summary: Hot lips, meet sweet heat! Burt's Bees and Mike's Hot Honey have teamed up to bring the buzz of sweet heat to your favorite lip balm. Beginning May 29, fans can purchase a limited-edition Burt's Bees x Mike's Hot Honey moisturizing lip balm, featuring the craveable flavor of Mike's Hot Honey's signature blend of sweet and spicy. Available while limited supplies last, this hot collab will be sold exclusively on Burtsbees.com and Burt's Bees TikTok Shop.
